summary: WOW! The full version of the Marauder’s Map was finally published! It shows the entire Hogwarts castle and new locations that...
caption: WOW! The full version of the Marauder’s Map was finally published! It shows the entire Hogwarts castle and new locations that never made it into the movies! This map is different from the standard Marauders Map sold by Warner Bros. This is the Marauders Map Ultimate Edition!

REQUESTS ARE OPEN I also write for: BTS , EXO, SOME NCT, MONSTA X , IKON ,PENTAGON , ATEEZ

Currently working on a masterlist but I don’t have many posts

summary: Scorpius, truth: which one would you choose (as a potions class partner, to take to a quidditch match, to spend time at summer...
body:
Scorpius, truth: which one would you choose (as a potions class partner, to take to a quidditch match, to spend time at summer camp with, as a date, whatever you want), Albus or Rose? or dare: have a wrestling match with James

Scorpius: well I know the answer for the truth so please give me truth

Spinner chose : DARE ((why does this spinner choose dare all the time😂))

Scorpius: I AM GOING TO DIE!

Scorpius: *walks over to albus * i am sorry for what I’m about to do and if I die just know *whispers* I love you.

Albus: I know you love me you tell me all the time but what the fuck are you doing

Scorpius: oh how I will miss your compulsive swearing *walks to James*

James: yes ? Are you here to explain why you kissed albus’ face?

Scorpius: um no*coughs* I’m here to challenge you?

James: challenge me? To what?

Scorpius: a wrestling match!

James: do you want to die??

Scorpius: not particularly

James: right well let’s do this then

Scorpius : *gulps* is punching allowed?

James: normally

Scorpius: and kicking?

James: I suppose so but look, will you get me into trouble if I hurt you?

Scorpius: well it will be obvious

James: fine okay start on three. One two three!

Scorpius:*curls up into a ball as he is tackled to the ground by james*

Let’s just say James won and managed not to bruise Scorpius too much

summary:
Anonymous : James, truth: how would you feel if Albus was gone forever? or dare: admit you love your brother ffs.
James: please...
body:
Anonymous : James, truth: how would you feel if Albus was gone forever? or dare: admit you love your brother ffs.

James: please not dare , please not dare , please not dare

Spinner chose : DARE

James: for fuck sake!

James: *walks over to a table and stands on it*

James: *clears his throat and gets everyone’s attention * hello everyone ! I have an announcement to make.

Albus: oh no!

James: Albus!

Albus: fuck

James: I would just like to say …… umm …… well….. I love you lil bro and if anything happens to you well that would make me a bit sad I guess and also your not allowed a girlfriend or boyfriend until I’m married! Thank you everyone! *bows*

Albus and Scorpius: *gulps*

*scorpius whispers in albus’ ear* : al, he’s not married yet

by Kindred

Harry can’t take stand the lies any more, Dumbledore had gone too far. He needs a new start after Sirius’ death and Durmstrang seems to be a good place to start.

blog.name: savameh
blog.title: Um Hi
blog.description: Sav/17/INTP/She+They/Autistic/Agnostic/Biromantic gray-asexual/ADHD/current few special interests include my OCs, the Riordanverse, and Steven Universe. Lesser special interests are Homestuck/Hiveswap, autism, Hetalia, and Star Trek (AOS/TOS/TNG/DS9). I like a lot of things. Also, cringe culture is dead. If you're a TERF, ace exclusionist, REG, homophobe, transphobe, racist, sexist, or Nazi, please get the fuck off my blog.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.description:
My name is Cherry Hobbes. I work as a personal chef to one of the most influential people in the world and then ends up feeding all his friends. Sound easy?
Trust me. It isn't ||
for rp purposes only. 
FC- Zooey Deschanel

title: OOC|| Freaks and Tricksies
body:
So this is utterly OOC but I thought I’d share it here because I don’t really have other places that I really blog/share stuff.

I had a dream about my Harry Potter OC Babs, which is really weird because I haven’t played/plotted/done anything Babs related in a long long time, years probably, because I’ve really fallen out of the HP fandom.

Long story short: I got into HP when it was still just books (Book 4: Goblet of Fire), I dislike most of the movies because they cut out the majority of the scenes I like and were edited something terrible, and I genuinely disliked the last book and movie. I really did and it put me off the whole series of which, when I first got into I was a die hard fan. I’ve really tried to reread the series several times since it’s been coming back into the spotlight with the new series and I haven’t had any luck in getting past the first book so I’ve just kept my warm feelings for when I enjoyed it during high school. (I am a proud Hufflepuff since before Hufflepuffs were cool XD)

So, back to Babs and the dreams. 

Babs went to some wizard amusement park w/ the trio. It looks like a little German folk village (which i blame on my many years of attending Six Flags in my youth). Some crazy stuff happens that even I can’t explain. At one point they’re in this crazy steep, reverse amphitheater when instead of it all sloping down into a pit, it all goes upward, like a pyramid with steps all up the sides. 

A big part of this “amusement park” is there are people in costume who look like monsters. Kind of Amnesia crossed with Outlast weird looking things. So while everyone is up on the pyramid amphitheater,  one of the monsters is put in a blimp-dirigible thing along with stuff that’s understood will explode. It starts to fly over as the pyramid amphitheater starts to fill with water. The blimp thing gets so close that you could have reached up and touch it. This because a fear of Babs as she moves away and goes under water. Opening her eyes under the water she see this was the intention of the blimp as it goes underwater and explodes quite satisfactorily. There’s no panic. It’s all an expected part of the entertainment.

 The next moment finds the trio with Babs at a little outside cafe. 

Hermione, complaining about how plain she is. She says that she wants to cut her hair, change her appearance, or even dye her hair super bright colors. She’s upset though because she says she can’t because she’s a wizard therefore whatever she does is temporary (which I get is contrary to the whole rules of  J.K.’s world as witches/wizards do this all the time but I still it’s an interesting idea) Giving the idea that since she’s magic her appearance will just revert to how she always looks. Babs recommends doing it anyways, even with cheap muggle stuff, and have fun with how she can look with the short time she looks different and continue to change her appearance up (also giving the impression that while Hermione’s looks would change back to normal, it wasn’t instantaneous. Like it would last a couple days before returning to normal)

Also Babs said that Hermione shouldn’t say she was plain/boring because she was the smartest person she knew and wasn’t boring at all.

The title of this OOC post also comes from the dream because Babs wakes up and there’s a show on an old style, but very small tv, and there’s a movie on. The actor greatly reminding me of  Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje. He speaks the line above as like a curse and that was it-I woke up.

It was a very fun and nostalgic dream as also being very weird as dreams usually are. It’s made me want to revisit Babs but while I have no interest in writing anymore fan fiction about her/Harry Potter, maybe I’ll rewrite her origins and make her a playable muse here.

If anyone is interested in meeting her, let me know. Maybe I’ll make another post for her.

Thanks for reading all this if you did XD
body_abstract: So this is utterly OOC but I thought I’d share it here because I don’t really have other places that I really blog/share stuff.
